EVENTCATEGORY.NAME: Execution
EVENTCATEGORY.DESCRIPTION: Collection of package execution event classes.

EVENT.DESCRIPTION: Collects all PreExecute events since the trace was started, such as one generated for prior to execution of tasks, etc.
Collects all PostExecute events since the trace was started, such as one generated for prior to execution of tasks, etc.
Collects all PreValidate events since the trace was started, such as one generated for prior to execution of tasks, etc.
Collects all PostValidate events since the trace was started, such as one generated for prior to execution of tasks, etc.
Collects all Warning events since the trace was started, such as one generated for prior to execution of tasks, etc.
Collects all Error events since the trace was started, such as one generated for prior to execution of tasks, etc.
Collects all TaskFaield events since the trace was started, such as one generated for prior to execution of tasks, etc.
Collects all Progress events since the trace was started, such as one generated for prior to execution of tasks, etc.
Collects all QueryCancel events since the trace was started, such as one generated for prior to execution of tasks, etc.
Collects all ExecStatusChanged events since the trace was started, such as one generated for prior to execution of tasks, etc.
Collects all VariableValueChanged events since the trace was started, such as one generated for prior to execution of tasks, etc.
Collects all CustomEvent events since the trace was started, such as one generated for prior to execution of tasks, etc.
Collects all User events since the trace was started, such as one generated for prior to execution of tasks, etc.

COLUMN.DESCRIPTION: Identity of the user that caused this event
Name of the source of this event
Globally unique identifier of the source of this event
Globally unique identifier of a particular package execution
Data code associated with this event
Data bytes associated with this event
